weapons.name: Yurei
weapons.description: An Arasaka prototype SMG designed for their 'ghost' operatives. The internal systems are cooled by a cryogenic agent, allowing for silent operation and rounds that flash-freeze on impact.
weapons.specialAbility: Fires cryogenic rounds that slow enemies and can freeze them solid on a critical hit. The weapon is completely silent.

weapons.name: Cerberus
weapons.description: This triple-barreled assault rifle is Militech's answer to crowd control. It fires in a devastating three-round burst, with each barrel tuned to a slightly different trajectory to maximize impact area.
weapons.specialAbility: Fires a three-round burst in a horizontal spread. The last round in the burst has a high chance to knock down enemies.

weapons.name: Longinus
weapons.description: A monstrous anti-materiel rifle. Its unique charging mechanism fires a molten tungsten spike that continues to accelerate *after* leaving the barrel, reaching hypersonic speeds just before impact.
weapons.specialAbility: A fully charged shot has 100% Armor Penetration and deals bonus damage based on the distance to the target. It cannot be silenced.

weapons.name: Beso Mortal (Mortal Kiss)
weapons.description: A heavily customized Overture, plated in gold and engraved with Valentino iconography. It's said to be a peace offering from a fallen leader, a gun that fires kisses as deadly as any bullet.
weapons.specialAbility: Rounds have a high chance to charm enemies, causing them to fight for you for a short time. Headshots on charmed enemies cause them to explode.

weapons.name: Gut Ripper
weapons.description: A brutal, horrifying weapon cobbled together from a chainsaw and a car engine. It's loud, messy, and designed for one purpose: dismemberment.
weapons.specialAbility: Every hit applies a strong Bleed effect. Fully charged attacks have a 100% chance to dismember.

weapons.name: The Patriot
weapons.description: A heavily modified Constitutional Arms Defender. Wrapped in the NUSA flag, this LMG's rate of fire increases the longer the trigger is held, turning it into a screaming symbol of 'liberty.'
weapons.specialAbility: The rate of fire and Crit Chance increase the longer you fire the weapon. The final 10 rounds in the magazine deal bonus Electrical damage.

weapons.name: Glitch
weapons.description: A netrunner's last resort. This shotgun fires a spread of data-packets that seek out enemy cyberware, short-circuiting their systems and leaving them vulnerable.
weapons.specialAbility: Projectiles deal low physical damage but high EMP damage, disabling enemy cyberware and stunning robotic foes. A charged shot can reboot an enemy's optics.

weapons.name: Loa
weapons.description: A ritual machete covered in glowing, cryptic sigils. It's said to be blessed by a Voodoo AI, capable of severing not just flesh, but a person's connection to the net.
weapons.specialAbility: Hits on an enemy apply a unique quickhack that disables their special abilities and slowly drains their RAM. Defeating an enemy restores 2 RAM to the user.

weapons.name: Wasp
weapons.description: A compact pistol that fires caseless, needle-like flechettes. It's nearly silent and designed for high-speed, close-quarters combat, a favorite of Sandevistan users.
weapons.specialAbility: Significantly increased fire rate and reload speed while a Sandevistan is active. No muzzle flash.

weapons.name: Jawbreaker
weapons.description: A massive, two-handed sledgehammer made from a reinforced hydraulic piston. It's less a weapon and more a mobile demolition tool. Every swing feels like an earthquake.
weapons.specialAbility: Heavy attacks cannot be blocked and have a 100% chance to stagger enemies, including mini-bosses. A fully charged heavy attack creates a ground-shaking shockwave.

weapons.name: Widowmaker
weapons.description: A beautiful, old-world shotgun updated with tech components. It can fire both shells at once in a charged blast that can punch through concrete walls... and anyone hiding behind them.
weapons.specialAbility: A charged shot fires both barrels at once with massive armor penetration and a wider spread.

weapons.name: Spitfire
weapons.description: A cheap, mass-produced revolver with a dangerous, illegal modification. It can be 'fanned,' firing all six rounds in less than a second with zero accuracy.
weapons.specialAbility: The alternate fire mode unloads the entire cylinder in a rapid, inaccurate burst. Perfect for when your target is 'somewhere in front of you.'

weapons.name: Byakko
weapons.description: A katana with a neuro-link in the hilt. The faster you strike, the more it overclocks your nervous system, turning you into a whirlwind of steel.
weapons.specialAbility: Every consecutive hit increases your attack speed and movement speed. After 5 hits, allows you to perform a powerful dash-strike.

weapons.name: Stinger
weapons.description: A combat knife with a built-in injector. On a critical hit, it injects a fast-acting neurotoxin that scrambles the target's optics, effectively blinding them.
weapons.specialAbility: Critical hits apply a unique 'Blind' effect, reducing enemy accuracy and movement speed.

weapons.name: Firewall
weapons.description: Netwatch's anti-cyberpsycho tool. A charged shot doesn't fire projectiles, but a wide, conical blast of thermal energy that instantly overheats and disables enemy cyberware.
weapons.specialAbility: A fully charged shot deals massive Thermal damage and applies the 'Cyberware Malfunction' quickhack to all enemies in a cone.

weapons.name: Banshee
weapons.description: Developed for corporate riot control, the Banshee fires a focused sonic pulse instead of a projectile. It's designed to disorient and incapacitate targets without damaging valuable infrastructure.
weapons.specialAbility: A fully charged shot releases a wide, conical sonic blast that deafens and stuns enemies, disabling their special abilities and scrambling their optics for a short time.

weapons.name: Pain-Drill
weapons.description: A horrifying weapon made from an industrial rock drill and a repurposed rocket engine. It doesn't cut; it bores. The spinning head is designed to shred armor and flesh with maximum brutality.
weapons.specialAbility: A fully charged heavy attack causes the drill to spin at supersonic speeds, instantly destroying enemy armor and applying a devastating Bleed effect.

weapons.name: Whisper
weapons.description: An assassin's tool, not a soldier's weapon. This ultra-light, mono-molecular foil is designed for precision strikes against vital points. In the right hands, it's as silent and deadly as a whisper in the dark.
weapons.specialAbility: Lunging heavy attacks have a 100% Crit Chance and bypass a portion of enemy armor. Successful stealth takedowns with this weapon briefly activate Optical Camo.

weapons.name: Ghede's Gaze
weapons.description: This smart SMG is wired directly into the Net. Its targeting system is inhabited by a low-level AI that views combat as a game, occasionally 'gifting' targets with disruptive quickhacks.
weapons.specialAbility: Critical hits have a high chance to apply a random, low-tier quickhack (e.g., Reboot Optics, Weapon Glitch) to the target.

weapons.name: Anchor
weapons.description: A heavy-duty revolver with a sophisticated gyroscopic stabilizer. Designed for urban warfare, it rewards a stationary, defensive firing position with unparalleled accuracy and stopping power.
weapons.specialAbility: Recoil is significantly reduced and accuracy is massively increased after standing still for 1.5 seconds. The first shot fired after this effect is active is a guaranteed critical hit.

weapons.name: Gyges
weapons.description: A semi-automatic rifle with a 'multi-vector' targeting system. It's designed not for killing crowds, but for dismantling a single, high-value target with ruthlessly efficient, targeted shots.
weapons.specialAbility: While aiming at a single target, the smart-targeting system automatically highlights up to 3 weak points (head, chest, cyberware). A charged shot fires a burst that hits all tagged points simultaneously.

weapons.name: Oni's Breath
weapons.description: A heavily modified Nokota shotgun that fires custom incendiary shells. The barrel is adorned with a demonic Oni mask that appears to breathe fire with every shot.
weapons.specialAbility: Fires a tight spread of incendiary pellets that deal high Thermal damage. Defeating an enemy with this weapon causes them to explode, setting nearby enemies on fire.

weapons.name: Seeker
weapons.description: A two-stage pistol for tactical situations. The alternate fire mode launches a silent, magnetic tracer dart. Subsequent shots fired in primary mode will arc aggressively towards any active tracer.
weapons.specialAbility: Alt-fire shoots a non-damaging tracer dart. All primary fire shots will home in on the active tracer, even around corners. Tracers last for 10 seconds.

weapons.name: Rhino
weapons.description: A single-shot, break-action grenade launcher designed for breaching walls, not for precision. It fires a massive, concussive grenade that prioritizes knockback and area denial over lethal damage.
weapons.specialAbility: Fires a grenade that deals massive explosive damage in a huge radius and is guaranteed to knock down all affected enemies. Has a very long reload time.

weapons.name: Warden
weapons.description: A non-lethal crowd control weapon used by Kang Tao's corporate security. This elegant staff can be spun to build up a powerful electrical charge, which is then released on the next strike.
weapons.specialAbility: Non-lethal. Blocking incoming attacks builds up a charge. A heavy attack expends the charge to release a powerful electrical blast that can chain to nearby enemies.
